Events that occurred on 25 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1893 - Robert Gilson, childhood friend of Tolkien, is born.
1924 - Actor Billy Barty is born.
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 50.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 87.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 213.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien seeks to publish "The End of Bovadium".
2003 - RingCon III in Tacoma, Washington.
2005 - The Tolkien Ensemble publish their fourth album, Leaving Rivendell.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Prisoner of the Free Peoples" is released in Europe.
2010 – German translator Walter Scherf dies.
2022 – Animator Jules Bass dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by Voronwë, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
The Council of Elrond. It is decided that the One Ring must go to Mordor. Frodo and Sam take the mission.
Aragorn, Elladan and Elrohir go out to scout the vicinity.
